trans-unit.source: An identity column is a column that stores numbers that increment by one with each insertion. Identity columns are sometimes called autoincrement columns.

seg-source.mrk: An identity column is a column that stores numbers that increment by one with each insertion.
Identity columns are sometimes called autoincrement columns.

target.mrk: An identity column is a column that stores numbers that increment by one with each insertion.
Identity columns are sometimes called autoincrement columns.

trans-unit.source: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides autoincrement as a built-in feature; see CREATE TABLE statement in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

seg-source.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides autoincrement as a built-in feature; see CREATE TABLE statement in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

target.mrk: <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> provides autoincrement as a built-in feature; see CREATE TABLE statement in the <cite><ph conref="../conrefs.dita#pub/citref"></ph></cite>.

trans-unit.source: Below is an example that shows how to use an identity column to create the MAP_ID column of the MAPS table in the toursDB database.

seg-source.mrk: Below is an example that shows how to use an identity column to create the MAP_ID column of the MAPS table in the toursDB database.

target.mrk: Below is an example that shows how to use an identity column to create the MAP_ID column of the MAPS table in the toursDB database.

trans-unit.source: CREATE TABLE MAPS ( MAP_ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), MAP_NAME VARCHAR(24) NOT NULL, REGION VARCHAR(26), AREA DECIMAL(8,4) NOT NULL, PHOTO_FORMAT VARCHAR(26) NOT NULL, PICTURE BLOB(102400), UNIQUE (MAP_ID, MAP_NAME) )

seg-source.mrk: CREATE TABLE MAPS ( MAP_ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), MAP_NAME VARCHAR(24) NOT NULL, REGION VARCHAR(26), AREA DECIMAL(8,4) NOT NULL, PHOTO_FORMAT VARCHAR(26) NOT NULL, PICTURE BLOB(102400), UNIQUE (MAP_ID, MAP_NAME) )

target.mrk: CREATE TABLE MAPS ( MAP_ID INTEGER NOT NULL GENERATED ALWAYS AS IDENTITY (START WITH 1, INCREMENT BY 1), MAP_NAME VARCHAR(24) NOT NULL, REGION VARCHAR(26), AREA DECIMAL(8,4) NOT NULL, PHOTO_FORMAT VARCHAR(26) NOT NULL, PICTURE BLOB(102400), UNIQUE (MAP_ID, MAP_NAME) )
